about_desc: My name is Mathijs and I am 21 years old. I am a filmmaker on Bonaire, but I am also a photographer, underwater photographer and animator.   I have already been able to do many cool projects such as - Skating NK  - Editing for the mxgp - Working on cinema films. - Video clip Crook and Frenna. And much more! I am multi-disciplined. Together with you I will sit down for the best photo, video or animation that suits your company, family or team!
